description: An extension that provides code completion, validations, formatters, diagnostics, cheat-sheets, code-actions, creation of files, and development tools to help develop Minecraft Bedrock content
name: blockceptionvscodeminecraftbedrockdevelopmentextension

scripts.compile: npm run compile:shared && npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server && tsc -b
scripts.preversion: cd client && npm version patch && cd ../server && npm version patch && cd ..
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.update: cd client && npm run update && cd ../server && npm run update && cd .. && npm update && npm audit fix
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:client && npm run webpack:server

BC-MC.Plugin.CodeLens.description: Turns on or off the code lens

BC-MC.Education.Enable.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the education content

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Enable.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics in general

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Lang.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics for languages

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Json.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics for json files

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Mcfunctions.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics for mcfunctions

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Objectives.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics for scoreboard objectives

BC-MC.Diagnostics.Tags.description: Requires restart: Turns on or off the diagnostics for tags

BC-MC.Completion.JSON.description: Turns on or off the dynamic completion for JSON

BC-MC.Completion.Lang.Dynamic.description: Turns on or off the dynamic completion for lang files

BC-MC.Completion.Lang.Comments.description: Turns on or off the comment completion for lang files ie; ### and ### (region)

commands.title: Add all from pack to language file
Behavior Pack: Create animation controllers file
Resource Pack: Create animation controllers files
Resource Pack: Create the biomes_client file
Resource Pack: Create the blocks file
Resource Pack: Create block culling rule file
Resource Pack: Create item texture file

Resource Pack: Create the particle file
Resource Pack: Create the render controller file
Resource Pack: Create the sounds file
Resource Pack: Create the sound definitions file
Resource Pack: Create the terrain texture file
Resource Pack: Create the texture_list file

walkthroughs.description: Learn the basics of Blockception's Minecraft extension
walkthroughs.title: Blockception Minecraft

steps.title: Create a new resource pack
steps.description:
Create a new resource pack, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc-create-project-resource-pack)

steps.title: Create a new behavior pack
steps.description:
Create a new behavior pack, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc-create-project-behavior-pack)

steps.title: Create a new world
steps.description:
Create a new world, using the command palette, this will also create an RP and BP.
[Run Command](command:bc-create-project-world)

steps.title: Show Microsoft's Minecraft Documentation
steps.description:
Show Microsoft's Minecraft Documentation, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc.minecraft.docs.show)

steps.title: Show Vanilla Minecraft Files
steps.description:
Show Vanilla Minecraft Files, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc.minecraft.vanilla.show)

steps.title: Show latest errors
steps.description:
Show latest errors produced by minecraft, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc.errors.open_lastest)

steps.description:
Create BP-RP entities files, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc-create-entity)

steps.title: Create all language files
steps.description:
Create all language files, using the command palette.
[Run Command](command:bc-create-language-all)
